participant_1.background:
I am a stay at home mom because my depression and anxiety makes it difficult for me to work outside the home.
I'm the one always tripping over my own two feet while running track.
i volunteer at the local humane society.
I want to find a way to keep my curly hair in place.
I used to go bowling with my parents on weekends.

participant_2.background:
I want to be in good shape for my cosplay at Comic Con, so I try to exercise every day.
I once got to meet a real unicorn in the forest near my house.
i m recently divorced.
I am a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend.
i am a vet tech.

content.text: Hey, what do you do for fun?
I am a vet tech, but I love to cosplay as my favorite characters. I go to Comic Con every year.
I love Comic Con! I wish I could go every year, but it's a bit pricey.
I know, it can be. It's worth it though.
I'm a stay at home mom, so I don't really have time to go out much. But I love volunteering at the humane society.
That's really great! I love animals too. I used to go to the dog park with my ex-husband every weekend, but we split up a few months ago.
I'm sorry to hear that. I know how that feels. I was married for 12 years, but we divorced a few years ago.
It's okay. I'm starting to feel better about it. I've been spending more time with my family and friends.
That's good. I'm glad you're feeling better.
Thanks. I'm trying to focus on the positive.
That's the best way to be.
